description: Welcome to a new era of wireless technology. ezShare is an advanced Wi-Fi SD card that allows you to download pictures using your Wi-Fi equipped smart devices (iPhone, iPad, Tablets, laptop, etc) directly from the camera. IOS and Android can download client from app store,Windows Clientdownload: http://goo.gl/ksds6k. Instant download while camera continues shooting. That's right! That means pictures can be downloaded without having to take the SD card out from camera. It also works with videos! Thus, we no longer need to transfer SD cards in and out of machines. You must get this card to experience the ultimate convenience you have never imagined! Get yours now for you, friends and family! You can watchthe instruction videohere: http://goo.gl/hYG4fWAlthough the product works with most SDHC compatible cameras from your favorite brands, including Canon, Casio, HP, Nikon, Olympus, Panasonic, Sanyo, Sony and more. Although most of cameras has passed the compatibility test, there are some cameras that are not compatible. If the product does not work, kindly be advised that the product purchased fromNew New Inchas 18 month warranty, products are eligible for Amazon's  30-day returns policy and Prime or Super Saver Shipping.Wireless StandardsIEEE 802.11b/g/nApplicationsDigital Camera, Digital Video, DSLR or other devices with SDHC slotAccess TerminalsWi-Fi device(iPhone, iPad, Smart Phones, Tablets, Pad, Laptops, etcApplicable format:JPEG/RAW/AVI/MP4/MOV,etcBrowsers SupportSafari/IE/OPERA/ChromeMax.
